article.title: Upcoming Events
article.caption: Baby massage, drumming, psychic awareness, Circle of Seven Senses & Yoga
article.body:
Coming up in March

Baby Massage Course — 5 week course starts Tuesday 15th March (10.30am to 11.30am)
 
Drumming Moon Circle — meets on 17th March (6.30pm to 7.45pm)
 
Psychic awareness course — with Claire, 6 week course starting 24th March (Thurs evenings)
 
Circle of the Seven Senses —  with Liesl, 27th March (Sunday only)

            Coming up in April

Yoga Classes — with Leandra, 5 weeks of yoga classes starting 6th April (Wed evenings, 5.30pm to 6.45pm)
 
See the entries on our main page for details.

article.title: Upcoming March Series: Psychic Awareness Course
article.body:
Claire Nicholls is a clairvoyant, tarot and palm reader who has been working in the field for over 20 years.

Claire held the first Psychic Awareness Course at the Studio in September/October (see earlier news). It was so successful she is running another starting Thursday 24 March 2022, again for 6 weeks, from 6.30pm-9.30pm on Thursday. Explore your psychic abilities, learn about the crystal ball, palmistry, mediumship, dowsing, psychometry and much more. (It's also great fun!) It is £90 for the full course (£40 non-refundable deposit required to hold your space).

For more details, please contact either Tranquil Spirit Studio (irene@tranquilspiritstudio.com, 07941 697047) or Claire herself (clairepscychicevent@gmail.com, 01904 659979).

article.title: January Series: Learn the Tarot with Claire
article.body:
Claire Nicholls is a clairvoyant, tarot and palm reader who has been working in the field for over 20 years.

Claire will be holding a new course Learn the Tarot at Tranquil Spirit Studio, starting Friday 28 January 2022 from 6.30pm-9.30pm and continuing for 6 weeks on Fridays at the same time. £90 for the 6 weeks course.

article.title: January Event: First Full Moon—Drumming for Relaxation and Clarity
article.body:
Sisterhood — Moon Circle

On Tuesday 18th January 2022, from 6.30 to 7.30pm, at the Studio:

⭐ Irene will be using her Shamanic drum under the Full Moon to ease you into thoughful reflection, clarity and manifesting for an abundant year ahead

⭐ Allow the resonating sound of the drum as Irene takes you on a journey to help you let go of stress and worry and access that deeper wisdom within

⭐ What You May  Need?

  1. a yoga mat, blanket, cushion
  2. water bottle
  3. reflective journal (optional)

⭐ Art supplies will be on offer to reflect on your intuitive revelations for those interested in  staying longer.

£10 (reg £12)

Please register in advance for this meeting by contacting Irene. Spaces are limited to 6-8.

irene@yorkreikiplus.com or +44 7941 697047

article.title: Circle of the Seven Senses Retreat — Hearing
article.body:
Liesl King's series of Day Retreats The Circle of the Seven Senses continues on Sunday 30th January 2022 at the Studio.

The theme is "A Sense of Hearing". Full details can be found here.￼

Each retreat is a full day, from 9.45am to 4.30pm, offering:

  • Yoga & Shamanic drumming journey
  • Creative writing and art-journalling
  • Guided, free-style dance

Each day costs £65. To book a place, please email Liesl at CircleSevenSenses@gmail.com or speak to her directly on 07743 441708.

article.title: Tarot and Psychic Development courses in January 2022
article.caption: Psychic Development Group out for a c
article.body:
In case you hadn't heard, there's something magical brewing in Haxby.....  
 
Here is a photo of a group of  us enjoying a delicious  curry last night at Janna Spice... the wonderful and newly created psychic development group that met for 6 weeks led by Claire Nicholls, (Psychic Medium for over 30 years)
 
Needless to say it was so much fun and we learned so much that  Claire has decided to next teach the many ways to develop our intuition to read tarot cards in January for anyone else wanting to join us weekly for 6 evenings weekly at Tranquil Spirit Studio. This course stands alone and is for beginners as well. Starting Fri 28th january 2022!
 
Get in touch with Claire  Nicholls
07957 835599

article.title: Circle of the Seven Senses Day Retreat
article.caption: A Sense of Smell
article.body:
Liesl King's series of Day Retreats The Circle of the Seven Senses continues on Sunday 28th November 2021 at the Studio. The theme is "A Sense of Smell". Full details can be found here.

Each retreat is a full day, from 9.45am to 4.30pm, offering:

  • Relaxation & Shamanic drumming journey
  • Creative writing
  • Art journalling
  • Guided, freestyle dance

Each day costs £65. To book a place, please email Liesl at CircleSevenSenses@gmail.com or speak to her directly on 07743 441708.

article.title: Circle of the Seven Senses — Day Retreats
article.body:
Liesl King has organised a stimulating series of day-long retreats at Tranquil Spirit Studios, on the last Sunday of every month (except December) starting on 31st October 2021.

The over-arching theme is Inviting women to conciously activate their spirits, fire up their creative imaginations, and dance!

Each retreat is a full day, from 9.45am to 4.30pm, offering:

  • Yoga or deep relaxation
  • Creative writing
  • Art journalling
  • Guided, freestyle dance

Each day costs £65. To book a place, please email Liesl at CircleSevenSenses@gmail.com or speak to her directly on 07743 441708.

article.title: Psychic Awareness Course in September
article.body:
Claire Nicholls will be holding a Psychic Awareness Course at Tranquil Spirit Studio, starting Wednesday 8 September 2021 at 6.30pm and continuing for 6 weeks on Wednesdays at the same time. Claire is a clairvoyant, tarot and palm reader who has been working in the field for over 20 years.

Explore your psychic abilities, learn about the crystal ball, palmistry, mediumship, dowsing, psychometry and much more. (It's also great fun!) It is £80 for the full course (£40 non-refundable deposit required to hold your space).

For more details, please contact either Tranquil Spirit Studio (irene@tranquilspiritstudio.com, 07941 697047) or Claire herself (clairepscychicevent@gmail.com, 01904 659979).

article.title: Reiki Healing and Aura Workshop Day
article.caption: Students at the workshop
article.body: On the 8th of February we held a workshop at the Studio, with the theme of Aura seeing and strengthening, for well-being and self-care, and how that could be combined with Reiki treatments.

article.title: New Beginning
article.caption: Room set up for a Yoga course
article.body: We are creating a new centre for alternative therapy treatments, and Reiki courses and workshops.
